Note: Pawling, New York. News Commentator Lowell Thomas, is very informally clad, for his presidential audience. He is pictured in bathing shorts as he chats with President Franklin D. Roosevelt on the occasion of the latter's visit to Pawling, New York to watch Lowell's "Nine Old Men" play White House correspondents in a baseball game
Note: If so, he seems to have gotten over it rather quickly. Maybe we could take a look at these together.
